post_text:
An important message from our administration:

Governor JB Pritzker has announced that all schools in Illinois are closed March 17-30. At this time students will not return to school until March 31. A decision on whether we will use Emergency Days or Alternative-Learning Days will be made following an administrative meeting Monday morning. I will plan to send information out to parents, faculty, and staff on Wednesday morning. The Governor‚Äôs closing of schools means that all practices and school activities are canceled and buildings are closed to students for March 17-30. Custodians, secretaries, and administration will report to schools as scheduled. I understand that this creates a hardship for working parents and I am hopeful that our communities can pull together to help each other out during these unprecedented times.
text:
An important message from our administration:

Governor JB Pritzker has announced that all schools in Illinois are closed March 17-30. At this time students will not return to school until March 31. A decision on whether we will use Emergency Days or Alternative-Learning Days will be made following an administrative meeting Monday morning. I will plan to send information out to parents, faculty, and staff on Wednesday morning. The Governor‚Äôs closing of schools means that all practices and school activities are canceled and buildings are closed to students for March 17-30. Custodians, secretaries, and administration will report to schools as scheduled. I understand that this creates a hardship for working parents and I am hopeful that our communities can pull together to help each other out during these unprecedented times.

post_text: In light of Friday‚Äôs tragedy in Sullivan, many schools are showing their support for the student‚Äôs family by wearing blue tomorrow, which was Tyson's favorite color. The Sangamon Valley School District would like to join this support by asking students and staff to wear blue to school tomorrow. Instead of the planned PJ day for Primary through 8th grade and in conjunction with American Day at at the HS, please join us in this support.

post_text:
Yearbooks are on sale! We have changed yearbook companies for this school year, so students will need to use the Herff Jones Ordering Center (www.yearbookordercenter.com) and type in our school code of 17358 to order a yearbook. Take advantage of the low cost of $32 until September 1 when the price goes up to $37, so buy early and lock in all of the memories from your high school year.

Last year's yearbooks will arrive at the school in early September, so keep posted on when those come in and we will distribute them as soon as possible.
shared_text:
THEBOLTONLINE.ORG
Now's the Time to Order Yearbooks!
text:
Yearbooks are on sale! We have changed yearbook companies for this school year, so students will need to use the Herff Jones Ordering Center (www.yearbookordercenter.com) and type in our school code of 17358 to order a yearbook. Take advantage of the low cost of $32 until September 1 when the price goes up to $37, so buy early and lock in all of the memories from your high school year.

Last year's yearbooks will arrive at the school in early September, so keep posted on when those come in and we will distribute them as soon as possible.

THEBOLTONLINE.ORG
Now's the Time to Order Yearbooks!

Sangamon Valley High School SV STORM Fans Joe Pickrell
text:
Gordon Voit - WAND Sports

post_text: Congratulations to our TCSV Girls Basketball Team! They beat Carlinville 45-30 to win their first Regional Title at the Carlinville Regional. They play in the sectional Tuesday, February 14 at 7:00 pm at Waverly High School vs. Illini West. Go Lady Tornadoes!

shared_text:
Illiopolis/Niantic Public Library is feeling excited.
January 25, 2017 at 1:44 PM ¬∑

We now have a book drop located at the Sangamon Valley High School to make life a little easier for our Niantic patrons. Any library material belonging to a public library may be placed in the drop. It is located next to the Ag shop door and easily accessible by car. We hope this is a service that helps encourage more library usage from the village of Niantic.
